s.text: I am Sgt. Adam Caldwell, a US Marine Sgt.serving in the 3rd Battalion, 25th Marine Regiment that Patrols the An bar province, Iraq.
I have now found a secured way of getting the package out of Iraq for you to pick it up.
I am presently in Iraq and I found your contact particulars in an address journal.
I am presently in Iraq and I found your contact particulars in an address journal.
I am presently in Iraq and I found your contact particulars in an address journal.
I am presently in Iraq and I found your contact particulars in an address journal.

The above figure was given to me as my share and to conceal this kind of money became a problem for me, so with the help of a British contact working with the UN here (his office enjoys some immunity)I was able to get the package out to a safe location entirely out of trouble spot.
This might appear as an illegal thing to do but I tell you what.
This might appear as an illegal thing to do but I tell you what.
This might appear as an illegal thing to do but I tell you what.
This might appear as an illegal thing to do but I tell you what.
